Name: South Side Royale
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) mint in base of shaker.
Add next 4 ingredients (all but sparkling wine) and SHAKE with ice.
Review: A White Lady with fresh mint and sparkling wine.
History: The sparkling wine version (hence "Royale") of the classic South Side Fizz .
